name: Klepto
description: Welcome to Klepto where there's no place like a burglarized home. In this burglary simulation you'll explore, terrorize and loot your way to success in a variety of open-world sandbox neighborhoods. **VR is NOT required for this game.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: GTX 980 Recommendation is only applicable for VR gameplay
